metadata.title: CVE-2020-14386 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - high
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the Linux kernel before 5.9-rc4. Memory corruption canbe exploited to gain root privileges from unprivileged processes. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality andintegrity.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14386` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-47-generic - 5.4.0-47.51
linux-image-5.4.0-47-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-47.51
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-47-generic - 5.4.0-47.51
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-47-lowlatency - 5.4.0-47.51
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1023-kvm - 5.4.0-1023.23
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1024-aws - 5.4.0-1024.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1025-azure - 5.4.0-1025.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1024-gcp - 5.4.0-1024.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1024-oracle - 5.4.0-1024.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.6.0-1026-oem - 5.6.0-1026.26
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1018-raspi - 5.4.0-1018.20
No subscription required

linux-image-5.8.0-23-generic - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-5.8.0-23-generic-lpae - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.8.0-23-generic - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.8.0-23-generic-64k - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.8.0-23-lowlatency - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-47.51').
linux-kvm package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1023.23').
linux-aws package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1024.24').
linux-azure package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1025.25').
linux-gcp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1024.24').
linux-oracle package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1024.24').
linux-oem-5.6 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.0-1026.26').
linux-raspi package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.0-1018.20').
linux-raspi2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
linux-hwe-5.8 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1').
